name: Dark Drafts for C++
description: A dark theme for sites hosting HTML versions of the C++ standard such as Eelis and timsong-cpp .
additional_info:
Updated to work properly on both eel.is and timsong-cpp.github.io pages.

Updated to overwrite hard-coded fill color in text elements in graphs.

Updated to correctly color subscript texts.

Updated to handle "https" URLs.

Updated to handle syntax highlighting.

Colors converted using https://www.w3schools.com/colors/colors_picker.asp:
Original Color -> Round brightness by 5% -> 100% - Brightness -> New Color
